```{r}
library(igraph)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)

citations <- read.table("./cit-HepTh.txt")
```

```{r}
m <- as.matrix(citations)
g <- graph_from_edgelist(m, directed = TRUE)
```

```{r}
pr <- g %>%
  page.rank(directed = FALSE) %>%
  use_series("vector") %>%
  sort(decreasing = TRUE) %>%
  as.matrix %>%
  set_colnames("page.rank")
```

```{r}
# Display results ---------------------------------------------------------

head(pr, 25)
```


```{r, fig.height = 8, fig.width=8}
# build dependency graph of top packages ----------------------------------

set.seed(42)
pr %>%
  head(25) %>%
  rownames %>%
  makeDepGraph(pdb) %>%
  plot(main="Top packages by page rank", cex=0.5)
```
